nodes.text: The A-180 blaster was a modular blaster manufactured by BlasTech Industries. It was a highly versatile design which could be easily reconfigured into a blaster rifle, sniper rifle, or ion launcher depending on the situation. Used during the reign of the Galactic Empire, one such pistol was wielded by Jyn Erso of the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
By 9 ABY, the A-180 was used by the New Republic soldier Davan, and, decades later, it was used in its sniper configuration by Resistance forces.
